definition: a saw/to cut with a saw
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: The Prussians are drilling in the meadow behind the sawmill.
sentences.chinese: 鲁士士兵锯木厂草操练。

sentences.english: If you ever sawed wood you already know the trick.
sentences.chinese: 如果你看过锯木头你就会明白其中的诀窍。

sentences.english: They drift the logs down the river to the sawmills.
sentences.chinese: 他们使那些圆木漂下河流到锯木厂。

sentences.english: They had been sawing; that was why they were covered in the sawdust.
sentences.chinese: 他们一直在锯木头，因此弄得满身都是锯末。

sentences.english: The sawdust goes to the chipboard industry.
sentences.chinese: 锯木屑则送到硬纸板工厂。

sentences.english: The yield from aspen timber is best when relatively short components of sawn wood can be utilized.
sentences.chinese: 当短的锯木部件可被利用时，白杨可以达到最佳产量。

sentences.english: It is necessary to exterminate the post at the sawmill.
sentences.chinese: 必须端掉锯木厂边的哨所。

sentences.english: You drift off to sleep and next thing you know, it sounds like a lumberyard.
sentences.chinese: 你睡着了然后被惊醒，那就像木场里锯木发出的声音。

sentences.english: Among the sawmill customers are the chair factory and other users of cut lumber.
sentences.chinese: 在锯木场的客户中是那些椅子工厂及其他木料用户。

sentences.english: Confetti and sawdust have also been used.
sentences.chinese: 也使用了五彩纸屑和锯木屑。

sentences.english: The timber was snaked to sawmills.
sentences.chinese: 这些木材被拖到锯木厂。

sentences.english: Make mitre cuts in your wood shop.
Any good suggestion for a wood saw?
sentences.chinese: 想买把手锯用来锯木。有咩好介绍？

sentences.english: Prior to 1957, the company focused primarily on lumber mills and sawmills.
sentences.chinese: 1957年之前，该公司主要集中于板材厂和锯木厂。

sentences.english: The logs were drifted down the stream to the saw-mills.
sentences.chinese: 原木顺流而下漂向锯木厂。

definition: a saw/to cut with a saw
to chop wood/to chop down trees
flat piece of wood/wood chip/CL:塊|块[kuai4],片[pian4]
